attributes.action: Take action to help old age pensioners,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Old age pensioners are increasingly having to make choices between eating or heating the house and having hot water.This cannot be right in this wealthy country, even with pension credit 18% of my income is allocated for utility bills.Allowances could be added to the pension or paid as a different allowance. I paid tax and insurance contributions all my working life, now at 69 I expect fairer treatment, cold weather kills elderly people, the Government must act NOW>

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
